title: How do people get 100,000 subscribers on their YouTube channel in just a few months? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simply forget about trying to hit these numbers. Concentrate on creating content you enjoying making and giving value to your potential audience. Get out there and be social, share your content on all your social media channels, but, give people a reason to watch. People don’t want to be sold to, or just watch someone making content to make money, it’s obvious to the viewer you’re not bothered about the content. Just create vids on something you’re passionate about and have fun.

That is quite rare but it is possible. Most of the people that got that much subscribers so quickly either got assistance from others. An efficient way of assisting is through shout-outs (telling people to subscribe to another channel) . Bigger channels usually do this for the smaller ones.
